info.display-setting-description: Any text and/or image can be set on the Chobiit screens.
info.app-setting-api-token-label: API token of this settings app
info.associate-accounts-navigation: Please select a Kintone account to associate with new user self-registrations.
info.kintone-setting.export-users-modal-descr:
Download the information of the currently registered kintone users in CSV format.
The downloaded CSV file can be edited in Excel or other programs, and can also be used as a file format.
Batch registration is possible with the import function.
info.kintone-setting.import-users-modal-descr: Bulk register Kintone user settings using a CSV file. To check the correct import format, export existing data to a CSV file first.
info.app-setting.table-column.list-record-url: URL of the List View screen
info.app-setting.table-column.add-record-url: URL of the Add Record screen
info.app-setting.linked-app-setting.with-auth: Enable app redirect after saving new record
Text for link to the Record List page
Text for link to the Add Record page
Select the conditions for email notifications to be sent to Chobiit users.
Enable email notifications for process management status changes
The following information concerning operations done by Chobiit users is saved in Kintone fields.
info.app-setting.linked-app-setting.publicati: Specify sites where embedding is allowed
If you do not specify a site that allows embedding, the page may be embedded in an iframe or similar on an arbitrary site.
Please enter FQDN (e.g. www.novelworks.jp * URL after jp is not acceptable)
API token of data source app
info.app-setting.display-setting.view-setting: Selection of the list view to be displayed in the record list (multiple selections possible)
info.app-setting.display-setting.abbreviate-e: Hide third and later event of the day
info.app-setting.display-setting.event-color-: Change the background color of events based on conditional field values (optional).
info.app-setting.display-setting.menu-bar-bac: Menu bar background color , table , plus button
info.app-setting.display-setting.menu-bar-mai: Menu bar main text, sub-table field names
info.app-setting.other-setting.custom-page-se: Enable custom page display after record save
info.app-setting.other-setting.action-feature: A button can be created to copy the current record's data to a record in another app.
info.app-setting.other-setting.select-copy-so: Select the source and destination fields
info.app-setting.other-setting.webhook-app-sy: Enable update of source app when destination app is updated

When the trigger field in the Action destination app is updated,
the following message is displayed in the source app:
This feature links fields and automatically performs updates.
To utilize this feature, a webhook must be set up in the Action destination app.
The required events are: Record is added, Record is edited.
info.app-setting.other-setting.api-token-of-t: API token of the Action source app
info.app-setting.other-setting.the-update-key: *The fields selected as update key fields must have "Prohibit duplicate values" enabled.
info.app-setting.other-setting.update-key-of-: Update key field of the source app
Update key field of the destination app
info.app-setting.other-setting.update-target-: Field of source app to update
info.app-setting.other-setting.auto-reply-mai: Field values from the app can be used by entering their field code as a placeholder.
info.app-setting.other-setting.use-fields-in-: Copy and paste the field codes below to use them in the Subject or Body text.
info.app-setting.other-setting.multiple-submi: Prohibit multiple submissions from same user
Select a period of time to prohibit multiple submissions.
info.user-setting.description-of-admin:
When set as an administrator, the following feature is enabled:
- System error email notifications
info.user-setting.select-kintone-apps-to-use-: Select the app(s) to share with the Chobiit user.
info.user-setting.add-user.password-and-login: Send password and login instructions via email
The Chobiit user account has been added.
Email has been sent to the user.
info.user-setting.edit-user-csv.password-and-: The Chobiit user account info have been updated.
info.user-setting.bulk-delete.modal-message: {{usersCount}} Delete a users. Are you sure?
info.user-setting.export-users.modal-message: Export the data of the currently registered Chobiit users in CSV format. The exported CSV file can be used as a data import template when importing Chobiit user data for bulk user registration.
info.user-setting.export-users.linked-kintone: The kintone account you want to connect to
info.user-setting.export-users.app-ids-used-i: App ID to be used with Chobiit
info.user-setting.import-users.failure-messag: Unable to configure Chobiit user settings
info.user-setting.import-users.confirmation-m: Import will begin. Would you like to continue?
info.user-setting.import-users.automatic-send: After clicking the "Import" button, an invitation email will be automatically sent after the import is complete if "Send" was selected.
info.user-setting.import-users.incomplete-fil: If the CSV file is incomplete, import will not start and an import error will occur.
info.user-setting.import-users.transmission-c: Send Chobiit invitation email to users after import?
info.user-setting.import-users.select-file-to: Please select the CSV file to import
info.user-setting.import-users.feature-descri: Register or update Chobiit user settings in bulk using a CSV file. To check the correct import format, export existing data to a CSV file first.
info.user-setting.import-users.attention-mess:
【If you are using Microsoft Excel application】
Please set all cells as "String".
* If you create a file for import using Microsoft Excel application,
If you create a file for import using the Microsoft Excel application,
the position of the comma delimiter in the app ID information will be changed, and the file may not be imported properly.
(The same applies if you edit the CSV file exported from Chobiit.)
info.group-setting.export-group.modal-message: Export the data of the currently registered Chobiit groups in CSV format. The exported CSV file can be used as a data import template when importing Chobiit group data for bulk group registration.
info.group-setting.import-group.modal-message: Bulk register Chobiit group settings using a CSV file. To check the correct import format, export existing data to a CSV file first.
info.group-setting.bulk-delete.modal-message: {{groupsCount}} Deletes a group. Are you sure?
